channel.title: Comments on: Giving DGS Another Shot

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Either one! I'm bengozen on both servers.
item.content:encoded: Either one! I’m bengozen on both servers.

item.title: By: David Kerschner
item.dc:creator: David Kerschner
item.description: OGS or DGS? I'd have to make a new account on DGS I think
item.content:encoded: OGS or DGS? I’d have to make a new account on DGS I think

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Yessir! Let's play a game! Blitz played by snails. Haha. How apt!
item.content:encoded:
Yessir! Let’s play a game!
Blitz played by snails. Haha. How apt!

item.title: By: David Kerschner
item.dc:creator: David Kerschner
item.description: Are you still playing correspondence go? I'd love a match sometime if you're still playing this way. As for your described problems with correspondence go, I understand that. I heard someone describe it once as blitz played by snails and that certainly can describe the experience!
item.content:encoded:
Are you still playing correspondence go? I’d love a match sometime if you’re still playing this way.
As for your described problems with correspondence go, I understand that. I heard someone describe it once as blitz played by snails and that certainly can describe the experience!

item.title: By: David Kerschner
item.dc:creator: David Kerschner
item.description: Are you still playing correspondence go? I'd love a match sometime if you're still playing this way. As for your described problems with correspondence go, I understand that. I heard someone describe it once as blitz played by snails and that certainly can describe the experience!
item.content:encoded:
Are you still playing correspondence go? I’d love a match sometime if you’re still playing this way.
As for your described problems with correspondence go, I understand that. I heard someone describe it once as blitz played by snails and that certainly can describe the experience!

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Haha. Thanks for having such faith in me Molokai! I don't know if my comeback will be nearly as grand, but I sure hope to make a splash when I do. Hope all is well with you!
item.content:encoded: Haha. Thanks for having such faith in me Molokai! I don’t know if my comeback will be nearly as grand, but I sure hope to make a splash when I do. Hope all is well with you!

item.title: By: MolokaiCowboy
item.dc:creator: MolokaiCowboy
item.description: In chess there is the story of Akiba Rubinstein who, as a so-so master, vanished from the scene for a period of time and came back a very strong grandmaster. Perhaps Ben is planning the same in Go! :)
item.content:encoded: In chess there is the story of Akiba Rubinstein who, as a so-so master, vanished from the scene for a period of time and came back a very strong grandmaster. Perhaps Ben is planning the same in Go! ðŸ™‚
